entry.title: 90"x156" Ivory 220 GSM Seamless Premium Polyester Rectangular Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 16.29 - 369.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity:  1 Tablecloth
Material:  Polyester
Color: Ivory
Size: 90" x 156"
Shape: Rectangular
Thickness: 220 GSM 
Stain and Wrinkle Resistant
1 piece, seamless design
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
Gives floor length hang on 30" x 96" table
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Premium Polyester Tablecloth

Our NEW Premium Line has the same, no hassle design as all our other polyester tablecloths! Simply open the package, put over your table and done. With our sturdy and economical polyester tablecloths, you can now transform any dining experience into a magnificent feast with an upscale feel and an elite look without breaking the banks.

Wrinkle Resistant

From the extensive array of colors, you can pick the perfect hue to coordinate with your party theme color. Not to mention, it looks great! It looks graceful! And you've saved yourself so much time from ironing or getting an iron. So if you're willing to spend a little extra for something you no doubt will want to use many times over due to its quality and sheik style, then this tablecloth is definitely calling your name.

     

Affordable

Plan as many events as you want and invite as many guest as you desire without even worrying about the expenses and your budget. Add a classy touch to your plain tables and table covers by swathing with this seamless beauty. Inspiration is a key factor behind transforming your ordinary event into a dream-like realm of ethereal festivity.



Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Dry Clean Only
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

 Linen Care Instructions

entry.title: 54" Yellow Square Polyester Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2253
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 3.99 - 89.99 (2 variants)

[About]
Quantity: 1 Square Tablecloth
Material: 100% Polyester
Color: Yellow
Size: 54" x 54"
Stain & wrinkle resistant, machine washable
1 piece, seamless design
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look.
﻿All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Polyester Square Tablecloth

Give your plain and lackluster tables a fresh festive look with these premium quality Polyester Tablecloths. Crafted from high grade polyester with seamless finish, these Square Tablecloths will dress your tables to the nines. Perfect for high-end events and celebrations, these stylish linens are ideal to add a dash of sophistication to your daily dining as well.

Stain & Wrinkle Resistant

Featuring stain and wrinkle resistant attributes, our best quality Polyester Tablecloths are an ideal accessory to give your drab tables a quick classy makeover. With top quality Polyester material and hemmed edges, these exquisite tablecloths are color-fast and can withstand extensive use. Get the linen in size and color of your choice and continue glamming your events up for years to come.

    

Multi-Use

Swathe atop wedding tables, banquet tables, head tables, party tables, or spread on your backyard bench to make a chic picnic table for sweet celebrations and special events. Pair with our Polyester Table Overlays, Table Runners, Table Napkins, and Table Skirts for a truly upscale look and effect.

 

 Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Square Tablecloth
  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Size: 54" x 54"
  • 1 piece, seamless design
  • Hemmed edges for an exquisite look.
  • How to Care: Tablecloths are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration


Linen Care Instructions
